name: Basic-R-Graphics
tagline: Using basic graphics in R to create interesting plots.
body: ## Economist This is my re-working of a graphic from a 2011 issue of The Economist that I found nearly offensive in its badness. The RMarkdown HTML page showing the work and the rationale is here. ## WAV_Plot This is plot that I created for use in a journal article. It uses the space in a way that you might call "non-standard." The RMarkdown HTML page for this one is here.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
